data.label: 小爱 SDK
data.description: ⼩米⼩爱开放平台借助小米的硬件生态和海量数据，提供全球领先的语音识别、NLP 等多项人工智能技术，为开发者提供一站式的人工智能服务平台。小米小爱开放平台包括语音服务平台和技能开发平台两部分，为企业级用户和个人开发者打造更多更好的语⾳服务和技能。

data.label: 小爱 SDK
data.description: Xiaomi Xiaoai Open Platform leverages Xiaomi's hardware ecosystem and vast data to provide globally leading voice recognition, NLP, and other artificial intelligence technologies, offering developers a one-stop artificial intelligence service platform. Xiaomi Xiaoai Open Platform includes a voice service platform and a skill development platform, creating more and better voice services and skills for enterprise-level users and individual developers.
